title: Day Drinking with Teddi Mellencamp
description:
Jackie and Real Housewife of Beverly Hills Teddi Mellencamp day drink and recap The Bachelorette, child rearing and how to stay down to earth-ish

This episode of The Bitch Bible was brought to you by the following:

Omax Omega 3 supplement. Get a free box of Omax3 by going to www.tryomax.com/bible. 

Sometimes water alone isn't enough to keep you hydrated, That's where Liquid IV comes. Liquid IV is an easy way to make sure that you're fully hydrated. Head over to Liquid-IV.com and use code Bible at checkout to get 20% off anything you order.   

Hubble Contacts is a proud sponsor of this episode and is offering listeners 15-pairs of free contact lenses. Go to Hubblecontacts.com and select BITCHBIBLE at checkout to redeem offer.
